generated.css: body,html{background:#101010;color:#fff;font-family:Heebo,sans-serif;font-size:62.5%;overflow:hidden}a,body,html{cursor:none}#app{width:100%;height:100vh}.global-article,.global-home,.global-search{width:100%;position:absolute;top:0}.header{z-index:999;width:100%;height:6rem;position:fixed;top:0;background:rgba(16,16,16,.8);color:#fff;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;padding:0 5%}.header .name{font-size:3rem;font-weight:700}.header .name .home-link{text-decoration:none;color:#fff}.header form{font-size:1.8rem}.header form .search-box{width:10rem;font-weight:100;border-bottom:.5px solid #757575;padding:.5rem 0;box-sizing:content-box;transition:border-color .5s ease-out}.header form .search-box:focus{border-bottom:.5px solid #fff}.header form .search-submit{color:#757575;transition:color .5s ease-out}.header form .search-submit:hover{color:#fff}.footer{z-index:999;width:100%;height:6rem;background:rgba(16,16,16,.8);color:#fff;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;padding:0 5%}.footer .name{margin-top:3rem;font-size:2rem;font-weight:100;color:#fff}.footer .name .home-link{text-decoration:none;color:#fff}
